website_summaries.verdict: Consider the Orbi if you need to cover a large area. Otherwise, you might be better off with a faster model.
pros: A good router on its own, but the Orbi really shines when additional satellite units are added to cover large homes and commercial spaces
cons: This router is merely "good" when it comes to speed

customer_reviews.title: 1st gen product, 1st gen problems
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after mostly glowing reviews. And it’s pretty good, agreed. But there have been a host of issues. First, my phone - Galaxy S8 - couldn’t maintain a signal. WiFi would drop almost every 10 minutes. This went on for more than 2 months - I eventually switched to LTE only on the phone. Second, recently the WiFi range seems to be decreased - I get random drop offs on an iPad in the main bedroom, which is on the same floor and less than 50 feet away. This only started happening recently. I want to like the product, but I recommend waiting through a few more firmware updates.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great Router
customer_reviews.text: I've used a lot of high end routers in the past and after several months I can say this is by the far best router I've ever used. You can set it up and forget about it. Unlike other routers where you might have to reset it occasionally, this one is very reliable. I haven't disconnected from the WiFi once with this router and it provides a strong signal throughout my entire house. It is pricey, but you definitely get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Every time I pull up the orbi login page it says Internet is GOOD. I discovered that MANY people have problems with ...
customer_reviews.text: After I finally got the Orbi connected, I have internet connection for less than 5 min. Every time I pull up the orbi login page it says Internet is GOOD. I discovered that MANY people have problems with wifi connections dropping out. This is 8 times in 2 days I've reset the Orbi and gone thru the login and setup to get 5 min of service. NOT HAPPY>
customer_reviews.author: S .Peters

customer_reviews.title: Better to go with other mesh network wifi routers
customer_reviews.text: I wish I have the option to return this now. What they advertise is not true. It doesn't maintain the same speed at all. I have my router downstairs and I am sitting almost on top of the router and I get half of it. It's not true that it covers the 2000 sqft house. It doesn't come that far. Better to go with other mesh network wifi routers. I should have bought the google one. Cheaper and gets more coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Vijay

customer_reviews.title: Great for homes with lots of connected devices.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace my Verizon Orbi of the same model. Verizon sold them but limited the firmware. When I added a RBS40V satellite that has the smart speaker, the Verizon orbing would not recognize it and does not allow for firmware updates. I purchased this one which is identical but with the standard Netgear firmware. It updated fine and the satellites connected fine. I have a smart home and lots of connected devices from streaming players, Ring Alarm, cameras, computers and mobile devices. No slowdown, excellent connectivity.
customer_reviews.author: ALAN G

customer_reviews.title: EASY SETUP!
customer_reviews.text: SEEMS GOOD, PROBABLY REAL GOOD, IT IS BETTER THAN OTHER WIFI SYSTEMS I HAVE USED BUT YOU NEED TO KNOW THIS IS TRULY A NEW SORT OF WIFI SETUP AND IT IS EASY TO GET IT SETUP AND GOING. YES, I WOULD RECOMMEND IT TO ANYONE WHO IS TRYING TO FILL A LARGER SPACE WITH COVERAGE AND NOT HAVE PROBLEMS LIKE OLDER STYLE ROUTERS.
customer_reviews.author: BOB

customer_reviews.title: I bought the Orbi router only to replace an Asus ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Orbi router only to replace an Asus one that had been giving me problems. The Orbi was up to the task. It has made our internet connection much faster and now even with multiple devices in use, we do not have to constantly restart our router just so we can have a faster connection to the web. The set up was a breeze as well. I did not have to call my internet provider for help. As soon as I put in all the router information required, I had everything running smoothly. Even my son mentioned that our internet connection is much smoother now and much faster!
customer_reviews.author: DafirstNoel

customer_reviews.title: Love my Orbi!
customer_reviews.text: Orbi blows my old regular router out of the water! I have a small house (about 1200 sq ft, 2 stories) and my old router struggled constantly to reach upstairs, and to allow more than one person on the internet at a time. With Orbi, we can have 2 people streaming Netflix and a third playing an online game without difficulty! Best router I've ever used!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Marie

customer_reviews.title: No longer works
customer_reviews.text: This product worked wonders and just like it should for less than three months. Now it won’t show a WiFi network, won’t let me check the firmware to update if it needs to be, and is ultimately a dead router. It pulses to let me check the router through its IP address using an Ethernet cable and by the time I can get far enough to start setting it up it reboots. I also know it’s a router issue because I can Ethernet to the modem with no internet issues. Ultimately needed to have done more research before getting this model.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Plante

customer_reviews.title: Good range
customer_reviews.text: My system is finally up and running. I ran into problems with firmware updates conflicting. Netgear was not very helpful. Range is excellent as well as speed. It's also very stable.
customer_reviews.author: tedsto

customer_reviews.title: It looks good and the wifi is reliable
customer_reviews.text: I replaced AT&T modem/router wifi with the Netgear Orbi. Since then I stopped having random disconnects. It looks good and the wifi is reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Alessio D.

customer_reviews.title: A single unit was more than enough for 1800 sqft two level house
customer_reviews.text: Bought a single unit for a 1800 sqft two level house and could not be happier. 5x to 8x improved signals. I would recommend trying a single unit to see if it meets your needs. I picked up a warehouse deal for $128
customer_reviews.author: caleb

customer_reviews.title: unusable device
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the device and finally tested before replacing my existing internet. My virus checker keeps on warning me and raising flags. When I go to my original wifi also plugged in, works great. I don't the unit based on warnings from my security on my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!!! I researched the Orbi70, and all the reviews were great! This is by far the best router I have ever had. Super easy set up. Strong signal. No more dropped connections. YEAH!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet L

customer_reviews.title: much better than what I had
customer_reviews.text: This router greatly provides signal strength and coverage in the house.
customer_reviews.author: IH

customer_reviews.title: Internet
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as advertised. Drops internet and you can't really talk to a technician, cuz they don't know.
customer_reviews.author: eligio ramos

customer_reviews.title: A vast improvement
customer_reviews.text: This router solved a number of my WIfi issues. I liked it so much that I gave one to a close friend for Christmas. R. Donohoe
customer_reviews.author: Richard E. Donohoe

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well and easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well and easy to setup. However if you have a two story house it does not seem to work so well if you are directly above it. Otherwise it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Shay Pickett

customer_reviews.title: Luckily Amazon has a return policy
customer_reviews.text: What a headache... Luckily I was able to return the item or my headache would have been much worse. Do yourself a favor and buy a router with "wifi 6".
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and services my needs. Wifi is good, better than advertised, closer to 2000 Sq ft. Coverage, though I'm not scientific about it. Bought it to replace default cox router, does the job and looks nice. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Cook

customer_reviews.title: More than perfect it arrive early than expected
customer_reviews.text: More than perfect it arrive early than expected. is a great solution and is not a bulky peace of technology.
customer_reviews.author: JoshJnkyll

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best router ever, I get top speeds all the time... :)
customer_reviews.author: Puma

customer_reviews.title: Works great even at extended distances
customer_reviews.text: Works great even at extended distances! I only have the main Router and will be getting a second node soon. Excited to have more extended coverage! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Anders Reber

customer_reviews.title: Not made to last
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a little over a year and then it turned to crap. Constantly drops network connection. Reset the system, ran the updates and it was good for a day. Now it is right back to dropping connections. Save yourself the headache and money. Buy a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Rick S.

customer_reviews.title: quick easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Fast, quick easy to set up. Wish the app was slightly better but that just being picky
customer_reviews.author: M. Wat

customer_reviews.title: That's it's a reputable product and will work for me
customer_reviews.text: WiFi in my shop. So far working fine Tech support not applicable Didn't use. Can't rate
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Orbi works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product works as advertised. Coverage is even throughout our home with occasional rebooting necessary.
customer_reviews.author: jpa

customer_reviews.title: One of the better routers I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Huge range, easy setup, and overall really solid router. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed with this product; it has a very wide range, reaching even outside the house.
customer_reviews.author: L E Moahloli

customer_reviews.title: I was so disappointed by this system
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed by this system. I have a Verizon Fios Gateway Router on the 1st floor of a bi-level ranch. The signal to certain areas of the house wasn't great, so I coupled that unit with this router and a satellite. My improvement was marginal at best. For nearly $400, I expected so much more.
customer_reviews.author: L. M. Marcos

customer_reviews.title: Best wifi I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Bought a new house over 1500 sq ft. I set this up and never had to think about the internet again. Best wifi I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer7354

customer_reviews.title: I got one because my son in law got one first and liked the way it worked.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hook up and works all over the whole house even with all the phones and tablets running at the samevtime.
customer_reviews.author: LYLE (Muley)

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed. I bought the router to take advantage of ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit disappointed. I bought the router to take advantage of the 5GHz frequency broadcast since it has many more channels to avoid interference with the neighbors. The unit works fine except that I found out that there are only four channels in the 5GHz frequency which is not very different from the 2.4GHz frequency. Tech support told me that the higher channels are reserved for communicating with the satellite unit and cannot be accessed by the user.
customer_reviews.author: Raghavan Ayer

customer_reviews.title: when you do a speed test it says its fine, eventually
customer_reviews.text: bought this to replace my 7 yearold apple airport extreme. this thing times out so much on every device, mac, pc, iphone.... when you do a speed test it says its fine, eventually, but the signal strength goes between 2-3/3 bars regardless of distance and sometimes takes a loading bar or imessage 30 seconds to finish sending/loading.
customer_reviews.author: K Tong

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth upgrading from older technology
customer_reviews.text: Made a dramatic difference in WiFi reliability and reception even for relatively short distances in my hove.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive product for limited improvement
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2 story, 1600 square foot townhouse so I just purchased the Orbi router. It has provided some improvement but not much. Overall, I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KLondike

customer_reviews.title: Really fast
customer_reviews.text: Just upgraded to the Orbi system from an apple extreme, sooo much faster
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: does not work!
customer_reviews.text: After fight with the unit for months I'll try to return it... does not work!
customer_reviews.author: Adolfo B.

customer_reviews.title: My old netgear unit worked fine in computer room
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2200 sq ft home and the coverage is not what I had hoped for at the other end of my home. Unit is place in our computer room where we have two wireless printers, one main computer and two lap tops. My old netgear unit worked fine in computer room. Smart TV connected by direct connection.
customer_reviews.author: chuck

customer_reviews.title: I have had this for a few months and have ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a few months and have to occasionally reboot, but it reaches every room in my large house even through insulated walls!
customer_reviews.author: Post

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't speed up the internet like ti states it will.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Good, more secure router
customer_reviews.text: Setup took less than 1 hour. Seems to work well. Haven't had it long enough to give a longer term review.
customer_reviews.author: WonderDog

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product works very well. The only drawback is there is not much information as far as a manual.
customer_reviews.author: VolMan

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wifi signal is dropping all the time. This never happened with my old $20 router.
customer_reviews.author: Mark F. Hedengren

customer_reviews.title: AVOID THIS if you own Apple Products
customer_reviews.text: Made the mistake of not installing this until well after return window... nothing but problems in just 48 hours. Nether support a mess; firmware updates make the unit more buggy - does not play well with Apple products. They must have had great PR when this launched because this is a joke. Avoid buying this router - more options that are vetted out there with same bandwidth.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Suter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome router. I live in an 850 sf apartment ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome router. I live in an 850 sf apartment with my kid. We use multiple devices at the same time and wireless was getting very slow. Now everything is fast, Netflix and Hulu stream without buffering, and upload/download speed for files is great. Also no more dead spots in the apartment. Highly recommended, and this is just the one Orbi so if you have a big house I'd say definitely try the satellite system.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very easy setup, very good coverage, attractive styling
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unit for coverage in a 1050 SQ ft condo in a concrete mid-rise building. Placed it in the center room and have excellent coverage everywhere - no dead spots. Using with 2 laptops, a tv, and two cell phone with no speed issues at all. Setup was by far the easiest I have ever experienced. Was up and running in less than 10 minutes and most of that time was spent with my wife on negotiating passwords. Wife especially appreciates its appearance - no objections to it being out in plain view, unlike our previous multi-external attenna unit. A bit pricy, but its not like I have to buy a new router every year.
customer_reviews.author: F.C. Boston

customer_reviews.title: Good performance!
customer_reviews.text: I have used the router only without satellite for 1 month in small flat. Good performance, everything works. I don't face connection drop issue. I need to forward ports to specific device, the advance setting works as expected. I don't regret to pay Orbi!
customer_reviews.author: Diesel

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance
customer_reviews.text: I bought this this router because it a legend superior performance. I installed it and it immediately noticed that it failed to meet even the 2000 square-foot range promised. Returned it for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A Brown

customer_reviews.title: No range
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't even cover half of my 1500sqf apartment, my old Asus router had better coverage. It's fast when it's connected, but it just doesn't have range at all. On top of that, when I tried to register the product on Netgear's site it had already been registered before, meaning that wasn't a factory sealed item. This is not a product rather than an Amazon issue, still annoying. It's going back...
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Quick  & Fast
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered on time & packaged very well. Set up was easy & able to connect 8 devices with no problem. The reason for only 4 stars is that ever now & then you get kicked off line, reconnects back on. Otherwise I am happy with wifi.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie C

customer_reviews.title: Delighted I bought it!
customer_reviews.text: This router is very satisfactory in providing service to my entire house, even when compared to my prior device, also a satisfactory Netgear product.
customer_reviews.author: Charles E. Klein

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid wifi
customer_reviews.text: This is the wifi that I've been waiting for. Zero issues with 10+ devices connected. Set up was super easy. The orbi itself is attractive and understated. The orbi immediately corrected connectivity issues with an appletv and an iPhone that I'd been struggling with. Absolutely flawless wifi now. I couldn't be happier with this product.
customer_reviews.author: BlueOutMyFlipFlop

customer_reviews.title: I will be ditching this piece of garbage and buying another that does not mislead its customers
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS. They market this router as being USB enabled ot share files and THAT IS NOT THE CASE. When I contacted Netgear they informed me they have no plains for enabling the USB port so sharing files on your network is not possible using this device. I will be ditching this piece of garbage and buying another that does not mislead its customers. My last netgear product
customer_reviews.author: Antonio J. Lopez

product_meta.title: NETGEAR Orbi Home Whole Home Mesh WiFi System - Tri-band WiFi Router. Up to 2,500sqft of WiFi Coverage, AC3000 (RBR50)
product_meta.description:
FAST WHOLE HOME SYSTEM 
Start your Orbi WiFi System here! No more WiFi boosters or extenders necessary. The Orbi WiFi Router gives you high performance WiFi to your property from the basement to the backyard. Expand your WiFi System Orbi WiFi Router with 

UP TO 2,500 SQUARE FEET OF COVERAGE 
From the home office to the basement to the pool, this wireless internet system covers every inch of your home with a strong WiFi signal. Unlike router and repeater combinations, Orbi covers the whole home with a single WiFi network and name, enabling seamless indoor/outdoor and room-to-room connectivity. 

TRI-BAND TECHNOLOGY 
Award winning and patented Tri-Band Technology provides Orbi with a dedicated backhaul connection between the router and the satellite, so the system can manage multiple network connections without compromising speed. Watch movies and TV, play video games, download music, books, and more. 

QUICK & EASY SETUP 
Selected as Editors’ Choice by PC Magazine, Orbi works with your current internet service provider and sets up in minutes right out of the box. Use the Orbi app or any web browser to create your entire home’s secure WiFi network in minutes. No personal info, account creation, or hands required with the new Amazon Echo Alexa skill and our intuitive and preconfigured system. 

GUEST CAPABILITY 
Allow guests the opportunity to access WiFi while protecting your network and password. Easily create a network to service visitors, and Orbi handles everything else. You'll rest easy knowing that your information is safe from security breaches, viruses, malware, and network worms. 

- NETGEAR Orbi AC3000 Router 
- WiFi Router - High-Performance Tri-Band Technology 
- 2,500 Square Foot of WiFi coverage 
- RBR50
feature_bullets: Standalone Orbi Router. Add Orbi Satellites for additional WiFi coverage
FAST WHOLE HOME WIFI SYSTEM - 2,500 square foot of coverage. Setup Orbi WiFi System in minutes with the same network name & seamless roaming.
TRI-BAND TECHNOLOGY - Unlike other WiFi sets that lose speed as you add devices, Orbi routers maintain data flow for your connected devices using a dedicated backhaul connection.
QUICK & EASY SETUP - No need to create new accounts; just download the Orbi app, plug in your system, and follow the instructions on your PC, Mac or mobile device to get your house online.

COMPATIBLE WITH AMAZON ECHO/ALEXA - Control your home network using voice commands. Now includes Circle with Disney Smart Parental Controls - Manage your family's access to the internet by device, app, or website.
NETGEAR Armor- Built-in anti-virus and data theft protection for all of your smartphones and computers. Protects your connected home from internet threats. Included trial covers unlimited devices.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars98 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
